\begingl[glneveryline={\EnglishGlossA,\EnglishGlossB}]
Concerning[] that[] I[] ask[] the[] Venerables:[] (Are[] you)[] pure[] in[] this?[] A[] second[] time[] again[] I[] ask:[] (Are[] you)[] pure[] in[] this?[] A[] third[] time[] again[] I[] ask:[] (Are[] you)[] pure[] in[] this?[] The[] Venerables[] are[] pure[] in[] this,[] therefore[] there[] is[] silence,[] thus[] I[] keep[] this[] (in[] mind).[]
